main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Colorado Springs on 10 September 1962.
interesting points: The sighting involved one oval-shaped object observed using ground radar,The object was reported to have a course of 3, and the duration of the sighting was 4-5 seconds,Insufficient data was provided for a thorough evaluation of the sighting,There were observations of multiple round objects in the area traveling at an estimated speed of 1500 MPH,One sighting lasted for 3-5 minutes with visual contact confirmed.
